cycles.domain: Structured data density / Entity graph strengthening
changes: libs/seo: Added getWebSiteJsonLd(), WebSiteJsonLd component, WebSiteJsonLdProps; WebSite schema with @context, @type WebSite, name, url (locale-aware canonical home).
libs/screens/HomeScreen: Rendered WebSiteJsonLd with locale; home now emits WebSite + Person JSON-LD.
tools/validate-seo: Assert home WebSite JSON-LD (@type WebSite, url); updated success message.
cycles.impactSummary: Homepage entity graph strengthened with schema.org WebSite; crawl/discoverability signal added without altering routing, governance, or naming. All verify gates green (format, lint, content, governance, i18n, pgf, intelligence, authority-signals, experience-intelligence, frameworks, aec, orchestration, content-os, sitemap, media-manifest, seo, tokens, build, a11y).
